title: "Distributed peer review enhanced with natural language processing and machine learning"
excerpt: "The European Southern Observatory trialled a distributed peer-review system—augmented by automated reviewer assignment—for its telescope time allocation process, finding that it worked as well as the standard process but resulted in a smaller burden on reviewers."
